title: Presents data on UK Cereals Usage by Oatmeal Miller.

queries.query: select year, sum(oats_milled::float) as total_oats_milled, sum(oat_flakes_and_rolled_oats::float) as oat_flakes_and_rolled_oats_total, sum(oat_flour_and_other_cuts::float) as oat_flour_and_other_cuts_total, sum(closing_stocks::float) as closing_stocks_total from oatmeal_millers group by year order by year desc;
queries.name: year_totals
